Title: Carry forward the revolutionary spirit of Lu Xun
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Pioneers in front of the tomb and statue of Lu Xun in Lu Xun Park (鲁迅公园, Lu Xun Gongyuan), Shanghai.This edition does not mention designer or year of publication, another edition has Pang Ka and 1973.
